description.narrative: The programme will support start up voter registration support for the upcoming Parliamentary elections (planned for 2018), and lay the foundations for Presidential and Provincial elections planned for 2019. The Programme will provide funding to Afghanistan’s Election Management Bodies (EMBs), the Independent Electoral Commission and Electoral Complaints Commission, to plan and deliver voter registration in line with the national electoral legal framework. The programme will enable the UK to support the EMBs to learn from lessons from past elections, invest in planned electoral reforms, and aims to deliver more credible elections which reinforce political stability.
